items.sentence: Tom hoped somebody would buy his old bicycle.
Tom is the one who talked to Mary about that.
Tom knew that Mary wanted him to ask her out.
I doubt that Tom was ever in any real danger.
I even remembered to bring an umbrella today.
I never actually believed Tom was a Canadian.
I never do anything without asking Tom first.
I never dreamed that I would win first prize.
I never felt comfortable around your parents.
Can you make me three hundred copies of this?
